"現在、強力な敵性存在の座標捜索中。

お願いします。"

"強力な敵性存在の座標を特定。
転送用テレパイプ、準備完了です。

"領域の展開時間、あと半分ほどです！

"Devil Castle is summoning demonic
walls! Movements will be restricted!"

"Devil Castle is sending demonic
bombs! Pay attention to sky attacks!"

"Devil Castle is deploying larger

of Buster Piles, empower the

the chance to use them more often!"

"Enemy assault force has been detected!
Gather as much Mana as possible while
protecting the towers!"

"The enemy has started its assault!
Recover more Mana while defending our

"A strong signal has been detected
from the Devil Castle! It seems to be
planning an attack on our Buster towers!

the Devil Castle...! Please defend our

"The Devil Castle is firing lasers

"The Devil Castle is firing its
lasers towards our towers!

"Scale its defense mechanism and
attack the Weak Point of the
Devil Castle!"

"The enemy assault has been suppressed!

"We'll start the summon and attack

"The enemy army has changed its

"The enemy forces are weakening!

"There's only a few of them left!
Just a little more!"
